location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], Writing from Maghil, to Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter, received 26 November 1802, Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], informs Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident at Bushire, that having observed that the state of the Bushire treasury will not allow any remittance for a length of time, he [Manesty] has made arrangements which make it unnecessary for Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun to make any remittance on the account of the Honourable Company.
